div.h2: DISTRICT CLOSED FOR REMAINDER OF SCHOOL YEAR

div.div: The School District of Westfield will be closed for the remainder of the school year due to the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic. Please revisit our web page for the most recent updates and notices.

span.a: You are currently on this page - Coronavirus (COVID-19)

td.p: The School District of Westfield is committed to keeping our students and staff safe and healthy; and we also care about the health and welfare of our community at large. In light of the Coronavirus outbreak, it is important to keep yourself updated on the latest developments and stay accurately informed. As communication about pandemic planning and preparedness is developed at the School District of Westfield, it will be posted here. Feel free to revisit this area of our web page for the most recent updates and notices.

ul.li: N7046 Cty Rd M // Westfield, WI 53964
